description: The state of the source the data was added from to allow fast resuming.

sourceName.description: Identifies the source that the state corresponds to. It is empty for a polling source, as there can be only one. For push sources an empty name also uniquely identifies the source know as 'default'.

kind.description: Identifies the type of the state. Standard types include: `odf/etag`, `odf/last-modified`.
